messages.content: Brexit negotiations start 11 days after you vote – either Theresa May or Jeremy Corbyn will be standing up for your economic security.
A loss of just 6 seats and Theresa May’s government loses its majority – delivering the chaos of a hung parliament.
If you want to keep our economy strong and taxes low, not voting for Theresa May is the same as voting for Jeremy Corbyn. There's no safe way to vote Labour locally.
